LanguageData.ODC_MCV_MainTurret.label: MCV turret
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_MainTurret.description: Small turret used by ODC Mobile Colonial Vehicle.
LanguageData.OMC_Nightmare_MainTurret.label: Sutherland turret
LanguageData.OMC_Nightmare_MainTurret.description: Large mounted Sniper turret used by OMC nightmare.
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Acid_MainTurret.label: Glasgow turret(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Acid_MainTurret.descriptio: Large mounted Multi-Cannon turret used by OTC nightmare. Charged with Acid damage.
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Cryo_MainTurret.label: Glasgow turret(Cryo)
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Cryo_MainTurret.descriptio: Large mounted Multi-Cannon turret used by OTC nightmare. Charged with Cryo damage.
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Fire_MainTurret.label: Glasgow turret(Fire)
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_Fire_MainTurret.descriptio: Large mounted Multi-Cannon turret used by OTC nightmare. Charged with Fire damage.
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_EMP_MainTurret.label: Glasgow turret(EMP)
LanguageData.OTC_Nightmare_EMP_MainTurret.description: Large mounted Multi-Cannon turret used by OTC nightmare. Charged with EMP damage.\n\nWarning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OCC_Nightmare_MainTurret.label: Gloucester turret
LanguageData.OCC_Nightmare_MainTurret.description: Large mounted Rocket Launcher turret used by OCC nightmare.
